channel.title: methodology on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in methodology on Analyst

item.title: Log Analysis Methodology
item.description: One of the most useful artifacts when properly configured and maintained, are log files. All devices keep some sort of logs, even mobile devices.

item.title: â›”ï¸ Access Controls
item.description: DAC I am the leader! I’m the one that says when we go. A user, who’s the owner of the file or another object defines who can and who cannot view it.

item.title: ğŸ—’ Account Information Methodology
item.description: Windows There are two main places within the registry that contains that information: SAM hive for local and Microsoft accounts and Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\ProfileList for Domain Accounts.

item.title: ğŸ—’ Methodology
item.description: First, have a template for an IR/forensics sheet. This can be done in Excel or other program alike.

item.title: ğŸ§° Data Recovery Techniques
item.description: Below are the techniques, tools and instructions regarding data recovery from various file systems and devices. Most of the below techniques apply to HDDs only. Those that are for SDDs or other flash memory devices will be specified in the last section.

item.title: ğŸ—’ Incident Response Methodology
item.description: Preparation ğŸ“ Compile a list of all your assets (servers, networks, applications etc) ğŸ“ˆ Rank them by level of importance.

item.title: ğŸ—’ï¸ Forensic Investigation Methodology
item.description: Identification/Assessment (aka Preparation) In short, understand your scope (technical and legal aspects), your goals and people you are going to work with.

item.title: Console Activity Analysis Methodology
item.description: Remote vs local commands? Windows CMD PowerShell Windows PowerShell Event logs Operational Monitoring. %SystemRoot%\System32\winevt\Logs\Microsoft-Windows-Powershell%Operational.evtx, ID 4103, 4104 (if Windows considers suspicious).

item.title: âš™ï¸ Config Analysis
item.description: Can be hard (no consistency). Are they different by accident or from malicous intent. Baseline reference (what the settings should be).

item.title: ğŸ—’ RAM Analysis Methodology
item.description: Memory is the best evidence, although the hardest to preserve. If you recall Frozen II “Water has memory”.
